artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: red artist\'s seal: {Gotokan tō tekichoku kō}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 香蝶楼國貞画 {Kōchōrō Kunisada ga}
text: A woman wearing a blue kosode and black hood while walking in the snow is pointing to Osono from the kabuki play, Kanadehon Chushingura.
title: Woman with Black Hood in Snow
